[艸]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – grass blades. Duplication of 屮 (“grass”). See also the top component of 春 in its original version ( 萅 ).
䒑 , used in 前 , is sometimes presented as a variant of this character, but it actually represents a foot 止 over a boat.

[草]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *sʰuːʔ ): semantic 艹 ( “ grass; plant ” ) + phonetic 早 ( OC *ʔsuːʔ ) . Originally referred to 皂 , and later borrowed for the “grass” sense, replacing 艸 .

[皂]
Variant form of 皁 / 皂 ( zào ) , in turn a variant form of 早 retaining its original sense "acorn" (see there for more).

[皁]
variant traditional form of 皂
